verses.roman:
balagaṇḍi-bhogera bahu prasāda āila
sabā saṅge mahāprabhu prasāda khāila

synonyms: balagaṇḍi-bhogera—of the food offered at Balagaṇḍi; bahu prasāda—a great quantity of prasāda; āila—arrived; sabā saṅge—with all the devotees; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; prasāda—remnants of the food of Jagannātha; khāila—ate.
translation: The remnants of food offered to the Lord at Balagaṇḍi then arrived in great quantity, and Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu and all His devotees ate it.

purport.content: In reference to Balagaṇḍi, see Madhya-līlā (13.193).
